title: Citigroup CFO Mark Mason to Present at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference
summary: New York - Mark Mason, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference held virtually on Tuesday, September 14, 2021. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 3:30 p.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
